entry.title: New Year
entry.content:
Another year comes, so it is time for renewed spirits and happy faces! I just wish to empty the drawer of interrupted projects (and make this blog roll.)

Happy 2016!

entry.title: 20th Million Man March
entry.content:
In three days the 20th Million Man March will happen. I made this T-Shirt design for one of the attendant groups, but got no response yet...

Simple and effective.

entry.title: Under construction
entry.content: With barely a month left, I'm suddenly thinking about the Codegeist 2015 Hackaton. So tinyhub, you will be both my vendor identity and my development blog. Let's see what happens.
